Articles.Content:
**Mission:**

To send up three MEOS craft and have them meet around the Mun.

**Limitations/Rules:**

-no mechjeb or similar guidance systems

-no instant orbits

-screen shots are counted, the more of the same meeting the better (IE to prove that they stuck with each other for a bit)

-videos are better, I will post a link to screenshot-o-matic at the bottom of this post

-Only the MEOS system may be used to get to the Mun.

-The crews do not have to return to call it a success

**Links:**

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=11263.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=11263.0) T1G MEOS design

[http://www.screencast-o-matic.com/](http://www.screencast-o-matic.com/) screenshot-o-matic
